MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Data.Common.DbCommand CreateCommand ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Data.Common.DbCommand CreateCommand() cil managed
Public Overrides Function CreateCommand () As DbCommand
public: override System::Data::Common::DbCommand ^ CreateCommand();

Docs.returns: Nuova istanza della classe fortemente tipizzata.

remarks.format:
## Examples Frammento di codice seguente restituisce un oggetto fortemente tipizzato <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> istanza:
```vb Dim newFactory As OdbcFactory = OdbcFactory.Instance Dim cmd As DbCommand = newFactory.CreateCommand() ```
```csharp OdbcFactory newFactory = OdbcFactory.Instance; DbCommand cmd = newFactory.CreateCommand(); ```

Docs.summary: Ottiene un'istanza della classe , che pu√≤ essere utilizzata per recuperare oggetti dei dati fortemente tipizzati.

remarks.format:
## Examples Il frammento di codice seguente utilizza il <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcFactory.Instance> campo da recuperare un <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcFactory> istanza e quindi restituire l'oggetto fortemente tipizzato <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> istanza:
```vb Dim newFactory As OdbcFactory = OdbcFactory.Instance Dim cmd As DbCommand = newFactory.CreateCommand() ```
```csharp OdbcFactory newFactory = OdbcFactory.Instance; DbCommand cmd = newFactory.CreateCommand(); ```
